name: .BCBK
summary: Learn about .BCBK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open BCBK files with Book Catalogue on an Android device. You can open a BCBK file with Book Catalogue by tapping Administration and Preferences and selecting Import from Archive.

Since BCBK files are saved in a format similar to Tape archives (.TAR files), you can open them with utilities that also support TAR files, such as Corel WinZip, RARLAB WinRAR, and Apple Archive Utility. You may need to change the file extension from .bcbk to .tar for the utility to open the file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .bcbk file in Evan Leybourne Book Catalogue 6
images.caption: BCBK file open in Evan Leybourne Book Catalogue 6
